text: Tigerland is a 2000 American Vietnam War drama movie directed by Joel Schumacher and stars Colin Farrell, Matthew Davis, Clifton Collins Jr., Tom Guiry, Shea Whigham, Russell Richardson, Cole Hauser, Neil Brown Jr., Tory Kittles, Nick Searcy, Afemo Omilami, Matt Gerald, Michael Shannon, James Macdonald, Keith Ewell, Arian Ash and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * * * * Category:2000 drama movies Category:2000s war movies Category:American war movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Joel Schumacher Category:Vietnam War movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:American independent movies
title: Tigerland
